title: [Bug]: Setting ticks marks on a single spine doesn't work properly
Description: The graph is a 3D scatter plot with points defined by x, y, and z coordinates. The x-axis and y-axis are correctly labeled as "X data" and "Y data," respectively. However, there is currently no label for the z-axis, which is intended to be labeled as "Z data." The expected behavior is for the z-axis to display a label to provide clarity for the data being represented.
